isis.stitle: TSI 05-12-44 - Performing an Engine Stall Test on CE 200, CE 300 Bus Models with Feature Code 04085 Built Between March 12, 2004 to the Present

subjectgroup.subject: Performing an Engine Stall Test on CE 200, CE 300 Bus Models with Feature Code 04085 Built Between March 12, 2004 to the Present

geninfo.para: When conducting a performance stall test on CE 200, CE 300 bus models equipped with hydraulic brake Code 04085 and automatic transmission the parking brake must be disengaged. When the parking brake is engaged the engine will be limited to 1300 RPM and the engine torque will be reduced to 50% of rated output.

warning.para: To avoid property damage, personal injury, or death, park the vehicle on a flat level surface, set the parking brake, turn the engine off, and chock the wheels.

step1.para: Make sure the service brakes are in good working order.
Make sure the wheels are chocked.
Start the engine and allow it to achieve operating temperature.
Apply the service brakes and disengage the parking brake.
When the stall test is completed apply (engage) the parking brake.
